Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Kodi akufunsana nkhani zotani
Ali kufunsana za nkhani ija yaikulu
Nkhani imene akusiyana maganizo pakati pawo
Iyayi, iwo adzadziwa posachedwa
Iyayi, iwo adzadziwa posachedwapa
Kodi Ife sitidapange dziko lapansi monga ngati kama
Ndi mapiri ngati zikhomo
Ndipo Ife tidakulengani inu awiri awiri
Ndipo tidapanga tulo kukhala ngati mpumulo wanu
Ndipo tidapanga usiku kukhala chophimba
Ndipo tinapanga usana kukhala kopezera zofuna zanu
Ndipo tidamanga mlengalenga miyamba isanu ndi iwiri
Ndipo tidakhazikitsa mmenemo nyali yowala
Ndipo tidatumiza mvula yambiri kuchokera ku mitambo ya mvula
Kuti timeretse chakudya ndi mbewu
Ndipo minda ya zomera zothinana
Ndithudi tsiku la chiweruzo lidakhazikitsidwa kale
Tsiku limene lipenga lidzalira ndipo inu mudzadza mu magulumagulu
Ndipomumlengalengamudzatsegulidwa ndipo mudzakhala ngati makomo
Ndipo mapiri onse adzayendetsedwa ndi kukhala ngati nthunzi yamadzi
Ndithudi Gahena ili kuwayembekezera
Mudzi wa anthu ophwanya malamulo
Kumeneko ndiko kumene adzakhale mpaka kalekale
Kumeneko sadzalawa chozizira kapena kumwa china chilichonse
Kupatula Al-Naba	637 madzi owira ndi mafinya
Mphotho yoyeneradi
Chifukwa, ndithudi, iwo sanali kuopa chidzudzulo chathu
Ndipo iwo moyerekedwa anali kukana chivumbulutso chathu
Ndipo Ife tidalemba m’Buku zonse zimene anali kuchita
Motero inu lawani! Inu simudzalandira china chilichonse koma manzunzo ochuluka
Ndithudi kwa anthu oopa Mulungu kudzakhala kupambana
Minda ndi m’minda ya mphesa
Ndi a namwali akulu akulu ofanana zaka
Ndi chikho chodzadza
Kumeneko iwo sadzamva mawu opanda pake kapena nkhani zabodza
Imeneyi ndiyo mphotho yochokera kwa Ambuye wako ndipo ndi mphotho yokwanira
Ambuye wa Kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi ndi zonse zimene zili pakati pawo, Mwini chisoni chosatha ndipo iwo sadzatha kulankhula naye
Patsiku limene Mzimu ndi angelo adzaima pa mizere ndipo palibe amene adzalankhula kupatula yekhayo amene adzalandira chilolezo cha Mwini chifundo chosatha ndipo adzanena chinthu chimene chili choona
Ndithudi tsiku limeneli ndi loona, motero iye amene afuna, mulekeni atsatire njira yobwerera kwa Ambuye wake

Ndithudi takuchenjezani za chilango chowawa chimene chili nkudza posachedwa. Tsiku limene munthu adzayang’ana ntchito zimene manja ake adatsogoza, ndipo osakhulupirira adzati: “Kalanga ine, ndikanakhala dothi.”
Pali iwo amene amalanda mwankhanza
Ndi pali iwo amene amachotsa mwaufulu
Ndi pali iwo amene amauluka
Ndi pali iwo amene amathamanga ngati ali pa liwiro loopsya
Ndi pali angelo amene amakwaniritsa kuchita malamulo a Ambuye wawo
Patsiku limene dziko ndi mapiri zidzagwedezeka kwambiri
Ndi kulira kwa lipenga kawiri
Mitima, patsiku limeneli, idzafumuka ndi kuda nkhawa
Maso awo atagwetsa pansi
Iwo amanena kuti: “Kodi ife tidzabwerera monga momwe tinali poyamba?”
“Angakhale mafupa athu ataola?”
Iwo amati: “Kubwerera kotero ndi kopanda phindu.”
Koma udzakhala mfuwu umodzi okha
Pamene, taona, iwo adzadzipeza okha ali pamwamba pa nthaka ali ndi moyo
Kodiinumudaimvankhaniya Mose
PameneAmbuye wake adamuitana mu dambo lodalitsika la Tuwa
“Pita kwa Farao; Ndithudi iye waphwanya malamulo mopyola muyezo.”
“Ndipo ukamuuze kuti: Kodi ungadziyeretse wekha?”
“Ndi kuti ine ndikulondolere kwa Ambuye wako kuti uzimuopa Iye?”
Kotero iye adamuonetsa chizindikiro cha chikulu
Koma iye adachikana ndipo sanamvere
Iye adapitirizabe kuchita zoipa
Ndipo iye adaitana anthu ake onse ndipo anafuula mokweza
Nati: “Ine ndine Ambuye wanu wapamwamba mwamba.” Al-Naziat
Motero Mulungu adamugwetsera iye chilango chifukwa cha mau ake omaliza ndi oyamba
Ndithudi mu izi muli phunziro lomveka kwa anthu oopa Mulungu
Kodi inu ndinu ovuta kulenga kapena thambo la mlengalenga limene Mulungu adalilenga
Iye analikweza m’mwamba ndi kulikonza bwino
Usiku wake amaukuta ndi m’dima ndipo masana ake amatulutsa kuwala
Ndipo pambuyo pake adalikulitsa dziko
Ndipo anatulutsa madzi ndi msipu
Ndipo adazika mapiri molimbika
Chakudya cha phindu kwa inu ndi kwa zoweta zanu
Koma pamene mavuto akulu akudza
Tsiku limene munthu adzayamba kuganiza ntchito zake zonse
Ndipo Gahena idzabweretsedwa pafupi kuti aliyense aione
Ndipo kwa iye ophwanya malamulo
Ndipo anasankha moyo wapadziko lino
Ndithudi malo ake okhala ndi ku Gahena
Koma kwa iwo amene amaopa kukaima pamaso pa Ambuye wake ndi machimo ndipo anali kudziletsa kuchita chifuniro chopanda pake
Ndithudi adzakhala ku Paradiso
Amakufunsa za nthawi imene chigumula chidzabwere
Iwe siudziwa zoti unene china chili chonse
Ndi Ambuye wako yekha amene amadziwa tsiku
Iwe ndiwe mchenjezi chabe kwa iwo amene ali kuliopa tsikuli
Patsiku limene iwo adzachiona chigumula, kudzakhala ngati kuti iwo sanakhale padziko lapansi nthawi yaitali koma usiku umodzi kapena usana wokha
